content: happy holidays to all my friends around the world crochet hook size f or size needed for gauge size g for edging gauge each square = 6 pattern formerly at aol hometown http //members aol com/gandal195/angelsaroundtheworld html pattern also available through internet archive/wayback machine on this link http //web archive org/web/20071112151455/http //members aol com/gandal195/angelsaroundtheworld html
